content.description:
“The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the States respectively, or to the people.”
Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, ratified December 1791
content.question: The principles established by the Tenth Amendment contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: The rise of the Second Party System
Tensions with Great Britain over the Oregon border
Henry Clay's American System of economic development
Increasing sectional tensions over the extent of federal powers

content.answer: Increasing sectional tensions over the extent of federal powers

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
